A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: thought overall it was a great movie minus a few scenes that it could have done without. I liked the new characters\, felt that they had depth and purpose\, liked some of the topics and issues presented in the film\, and the emphasis on people not being completely good or bad but rather flawed as humans are. Also\, love the undeniable romantic tension\, and hoping they will further explore this area rather than kill it off in the next movie. I can see some people having issue with Luke in this movie\, but again\, it goes back to showing how anyone\, as great as they are\, can make mistakes and are naturally flawed. I loved it and watched it 3 times already. Completely disagree with all the haters!!
